coreFeatures.description: Whenever you spend SP while in Combat, you can restore an amount of HP equal to the SP spent. Choose any creatures within 5 Spaces that can see or hear you, and divide the HP among them.

You can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to command a willing creature that you can see within 5 Spaces that can also see or hear you. The chosen creature can immediately take 1 of the following Actions of your choice as a Reaction for free. You can only use each of the following commands once on each of your turns.

choices.prompt: Choose a command for the creature.

options.name: Attack
options.description: The creature makes an Attack with ADV. They can't spend any resources on this Attack, such as AP, SP, or MP.

options.name: Dodge
options.description: The creature takes the Full Dodge Action.

options.name: Move
options.description: The creature moves up to their Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

coreFeatures.description: You have ADV on Checks made to convince creatures that you are an authority figure. Additionally, you have ADV on the first Charisma Check made to interact with non-hostile members of military groups (such as soldiers, guards, etc.).
You're surrounded by a 5 Space Aura. You can target any creature within your Aura to grant one of the following effects below, provided the target can see or hear you.

options.name: Bolster (1 AP)
options.description: You take the Help Action to aid the target with an Attack. You can also do so as a Reaction whenever a valid target makes an Attack.

options.name: Rally (1 AP)
options.description: You grant creatures of your choice (including yourself) 1 Temp HP.

options.name: Reinforce (1 AP)
options.description: When a creature in your aura is targeted by an Attack, you can impose DisADV on the Attack as a Reaction.

coreFeatures.description: You gain 1 Talent of your choice. If the Talent has any prerequisites, you must meet those prerequisites to choose that Talent.

benefits.name: Aura of Courage
benefits.description: While within your Commanding Aura, creatures of your choice have Resistance to Frightened and Intimidated.

benefits.name: Protective Orders
benefits.description: When a creature gains the benefits of your Commander's Call, they also gain Resistance (1) against the next damage they take before the start of your next turn.

benefits.name: Restoring Rally
benefits.description: When you grant a Bloodied creature Temp HP in Combat using Rally (Commanding Aura), they regain that amount of HP instead.

features.description: Your presence is a symbol of hope and safety to those around you. You have ADV on Checks to convince creatures not to be afraid.
You gain the following benefits and a new Commanding Aura option:

benefits.name: Morale Breaker
benefits.description: Once per Combat when you use your Commander's Call, you can use the Intimidate Action for free against a creature of your choice within 15 Spaces.

benefits.name: Battlefield Tactics
benefits.description: Allies within your Commanding Aura deal +1 damage on their first Melee Attack on each of their turns against a creature they're Flanking.

benefits.name: Priority Target (1 AP + 1 SP)
benefits.description: This is a new Commanding Aura option. Choose a creature within 15 Spaces. Until the start of your next turn, each creature within your Aura has ADV on the first Attack it makes on each of its turns against the chosen creature.

features.description: Through years of study and experience, you've mastered military history and strategy. You gain ADV on Checks related to analyzing fields of battle, understanding historical battles and military organizations, or deciphering complex tactical maneuvers.
